episodes.title: Stuck in a Religious Cult for 35 Years  ! THE MICHAEL KUZILNY SHOW
episodes.description:
Simon H in this episode describes growing up and being a long time church member of a bizarre and controlling Geelong based  religious cult.

Simon says the church leaders of the Geelong Revival centre were very controlling, split up families , and believed all psychologists are devils !

This is certainly not just another ordinary church.

He says as a Child he was not permitted to make friends outside this religious cult, and as a result fell into a life of deep depression.

It finally took him 35 years to see the light.   There are other articles on Google from ex cult members, but church leaders say these people left because they had a troubled relationship with god.

Simon is now happily  married, they have a beautiful daughter and he has started Creating his own rules for life.

And the Geelong Revival centre is apparently still going strong.
